Title: Equipment and software approval

Step1.Title: Step 1: Select employees
Step1.Description: Please select some employees to assign software and equipment to.

Step2.Title: Step 2: Choose software and equipment to assign to an employee
Step2.Description: You can change some or all of the email address to your own to receive an envelope.

ApiDecription:
This sample features:

  • Remote signing and sending
  • Conditional recipients
  • Bulk sending

Code flow:

View source file BulkSendingEnvelopeService.php on GitHub.

Once the user chooses employees from the list, the user can modify some or all of the email addresses to their own. When the user sends the assignments, an envelope will be sent to the employeesâ€™ email address. The envelope is sent using BulkSend:createBulkSendRequest. The employee will receive a document to sign that contains their software and equipment assignments.

OperationResult.SuccessTitle: Great! The assignments have been sent for signature!
OperationResult.SuccessDescription: Please check the inboxes of the emails inputted for the bulk-sent agreements.
